project_descr: The project aims to help reducing the extent and effects of the drug use problem and death from drug use overdose in Kuwait. Actions towards improving drug use prevention, treatment, rehabilitation, and community reintegration services will be effected.

outputs.output_title: Prevention of Drug Abuse and A
outputs.output_descr: The project aim is the eradication of the drug problem in Kuwait with prominence on all stages of prevention, treatment, and relapse avoidance.

project_title: national drug use prevention policy and management
